name: Gamble & Die (GMTK Game Jam 2022)
description:
Gamble & Die is an endless room based shooter where you collect dice to change the difficulty of the next room.

Play as either the Jack, Queen, King, or Joker each with their own weapon. Collect the dice in the level to unlock the door and use them to decide the fate of the modifiers in the next room

W A S D - Move

Mouse - Aim

LMB - Shoot

ESC - Pause
